name: Roll Player - The Board Game
description:
Roll Player is a dice manipulation, strategy board game where you will compete to create the greatest fantasy character in the role-playing world!

Roll and draft dice to build up your character’s attributes!
Purchase weapons and armor to outfit your hero!
Gain skills and discover your hero’s traits to prepare them for their journey.

Earn Reputation Stars by constructing the perfect character. The player with the greatest Reputation wins the game and will surely triumph over whatever nefarious plot lies ahead!

FEATURES:
- Challenge yourself in Solo mode
- Play against 5 levels of AI (or multiple AIs!)
- Play Local multiplayer with friends on the same device
- Keep a record of your best heroes, recent games and various stats
- Interactive tutorial - Play and learn!

QUOTES:
Retromation (YouTube): “I think this game is fantastic! It’s such a good interpretation of a board game into a digital format. Just really, really, really enjoyable! Very nice!”

BOARD GAME AWARDS & HONORS:
2016 Golden Geek Most Innovative Board Game Nominee

FAQ:
- I've heard you're developing online multiplayer?
That is true. We will release it in the next major update (expected Jan 2023).
- When will expansions be added?
After completing online multiplayer and if everything goes well, we'll be continuing with Monsters & Minions expansion.
